Text:
"Clean RAR Scene Releases!"

Yes - RAR Releases - that noone wants. The RAR-format isn't for torrents y'know.

Still, thanks for the upload!
No, no thanks for the upload. Wait a few minutes and grab the unRARed version from eztv. Fuck "the scene."

What ever is your problem with RARs?  They save bandwidth and so, save time.  The only problem I have is that in order to seed, I have to keep the extra files around on my drive.  So I seed till I've uploaded more than I've downloaded, then I delete them.

Downloaded ep 14 and 15 in this shitty zips from TvTeam, both was fucked up after the unzip, episodes worked for a couple of minutes then frozzzze, irritating. Nobody that has the nice nonzipped version of .mkv?

Save bandwidth, why?  I have 100 Mbs line. :)
